testsuite.name: io.mycat.server.interceptor.impl.GlobalTableUtilTest
testsuite.system-out: CREATE TABLE retl_mark ( ID BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT, CHANNEL_ID INT(11), CHANNEL_INFO varchar(128), CONSTRAINT RETL_MARK_ID PRIMARY KEY (ID), _mycat_op_time bigint COMMENT '全局表保存修改时间戳的字段名' ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARSET = utf8 CREATE TABLE retl_mark ( ID BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT, CHANNEL_ID INT(11), CHANNEL_INFO varchar(128), _MYCAT_OP_TIME int, CONSTRAINT RETL_MARK_ID PRIMARY KEY (ID) ) ENGINE = InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARSET = utf8
